description.narrative: 2400 Older People in 2 districts benefit from livelihood Recovery programmes
Nepal Earthquake Early Recovery Response - humanitarian response including shelter, resilience planning and livelihood recovery.
Older people actively contribute to disaster resilience planning and their needs are reflected in community action plans
Older people and persons with disability affected by the earthquake receive accessible, appropriate and timely humanitarian assistance from the local, national and international humanitarian actors
Provision of transitional Shelter for 300 Households in Sindhupalchok District

mailing-address.narrative: Tavis House, 1-6 Tavistock Square, London WC1H 9NA
